law.catch_line: Library tax or appropriation not to be decreased when city becomes city of first class or consolidated local government.
law.text: Any library established or maintained pursuant to the provisions of KRS 173.310 to 173.410 shall not, upon becoming a city of the first class, or a consolidated local government, or a county containing a city of the first class, have its tax levy or appropriation decreased except by the procedure in KRS 173.790.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 346, sec. 180, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 223, sec. 6.
